programme.title: Metal Cardbot
programme.desc: Dahulu kala, terdapat sebuah planet bernama Machina dimana Metal Cardbots tinggal. Suatu ketika, planet ini tiba-tiba meledak dan memaksa semua penghuninya untuk hidup di Bumi. Agar tidak menarik perhatian makhluk Bumi, Cardbots menyamar sebagai kendaraan sehari-hari. Hingga suatu hari, seorang anak sekolah dasar yang bernama Jun secara tidak sengaja menemukan Metal Breath, dengan Metal Breath tersebut dia bisa menangkap dan menyalakan Cardbots dengan kemampuan yang berbeda.

programme.title: Pokemon Horizons
programme.desc: Petualangan seru dengan karakter karakter baru yang berlatar di dunia Pokémon yang sudah dikenal dan menyenangkan Baik Liko maupun Roy memiliki benda benda misterius yang masing masing sebuah liontin dan Poké Ball yang tampak unik tetapi untuk mengungkap makna benda benda tersebut Liko harus mengambil langkah pertama yang berani Sepanjang perjalanan Liko dan Roy bertemu Friede Kapten Pikachu, dan Amethio Dengan dunia Pokémon yang luas sebagai panggung mereka Liko dan Roy memulai petualangan baru mereka Pertemuan dan takdir apa yang akan terjadi Di sinilah kisah petualangan baru dan penemuan apa yang benar benar penting dimulai

programme.title: Kamen Rider Geats
programme.desc: Desire Grand Prix" adalah permainan untuk melindungi kedamaian kota dari ancaman musuh misterius "Jyamato", yang asal dan tujuannya tidak diketahui. Setiap peserta berubah menjadi Kamen Rider dan bersaing untuk memenangkan permainan dengan mengalahkan musuh dan menyelamatkan orang. Pemenang Desire Grand Prix akan dihargai dengan "hak untuk menghidupkan dunia yang ideal" sebagai hadiah. Dengan kata lain, hanya pahlawan sejati yang memenangkan kompetisi yang akan dapat mewujudkan dunia yang mereka inginkan.

programme.title: Cai Yoo (Cerita Anak Indonesia Yoo Yoo Yoo)
programme.desc: Program hiburan yang edukatif yang disajikan bagi penonton anak-anak, dipandu oleh seorang host yang akan mendatangi sekolah-sekolah untuk mengajak siswa bermain sambil belajar bersama. Program ini akan menampilkan praktik sains dari kakak Ilmuwan, pertunjukan dongeng, hingga pertunjukan bakat siswa seperti menyanyi, menari, berolahraga, dll. Pada setiap bagian program terdapat pembelajaran bagi siswa yang dikemas lebih menyenangkan.

programme.title: Mtlb Goo!
programme.desc: Program magazine yang mengeksplor tempat-tempat unik dan mendatangi orang-orang dengan kisah menarik. Dikemas dalam bentuk cerita perjalanan Michael Tjandra bersama para sahabat. Sehingga selain banyaknya informasi yang diberikan, keseruan pengalaman perjalanan Michael Tjandra juga dihadirkan kepada penonton.

programme.title: Super Wings
programme.desc: Pengantaran paket oleh Jett yang akan ditemani oleh super wings lainnya yang juga bisa berubah menjadi robot untuk memudahkan mereka dalam mengantarkan paket untuk anak-anak di seluruh dunia mulai dari pengantaran yang ringan sampai pengantaran yang sangat berat.

programme.title: Bola Kampung
programme.desc: Cerita ini berlatar di Kampung Gong Lechar di daerah Pohon Bambu. Berkisah tentang sekelompok remaja yang memiliki hasrat besar terhadap sepak bola untuk bersenang-senang. Kemudian kepala sekolah, Pak Doud, dan pelatih yang baru diangkat, Pak Abdul Rahman, memutuskan untuk membentuk tim sepak bola yang akan mewakili mereka dalam kompetisi antar sekolah. Iwan memimpin tim dalam perjuangannya menjadi tim terbaik di tingkat kabupaten. Sayangnya, mimpi Iwan ditentang oleh ayahnya, Azman, karena ayahnya tidak ingin Iwan menjadi sepertinya yang memiliki nasib tragis sehingga karir sepak bolanya tercoreng. Namun dengan dukungan teman-temannya, Azizul dan Sabok, Iwan berhasil mengatasi masalah dan muncul sebagai tulang punggung tim. Dengan kebersamaan, tim berusaha untuk mengatasi tantangan yang menghadang demi mencapai impiannya.

programme.title: Makan Mulu
programme.desc: Makan Mulu merupakan program yang menyajikan berbagai referensi kuliner serta jajanan yang kekinian, dan menjelajah tempat-tempat kuliner yang unik dan viral. Perjalanan ini tambah seru karena beragam kuliner dan lokasinya akan di review oleh seorang Food Vloger/Chef/Food Expert yang seru dan ekspresif.

programme.title: Adu Kelas
programme.desc: Adu Kelas merupakan program variety show yang menayangkan kompetisi berupa game antar angkatan atau antar kelas di dalam suatu perlombaan, menghadirkan penampilan bintang tamu, serta menampilkan pertunjukkan minat dan bakat siswa siswi SMA yang menjadi tuan rumah. Program ini akan dipandu oleh seorang host dan duta kelas yang pastinya seru, lucu dan kekinian.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Di tengah hutan belantara, terdapat desa rahasia dihuni oleh sekelompok makhluk kecil berwarna biru yang dipimpin oleh Papa Smurf. Para Smurf tinggal di rumah berbentuk jamur dan hidup dengan damai. Namun, kedatangan penyihir jahat Gargamel dan kucingnya, Azrael, merusak kedamaian desa tersebut. Sehingga para Smurf harus mencari cara agar tidak ditangkap oleh Gargamel dan Azrael.

programme.title: Pj Masks
programme.desc: Serial animasi ini berkisah tentang tiga anak normal yang berkegiatan pada siang hari. Namun pada malam hari, mereka akan menjadi pahlawan yang menggunakan topeng. Biasanya, masalah itu terjadi pada siang hari saat mereka sekolah. Dan tugas mereka, menyelesaikan masalah itu pada malam harinya. Akan ada banyak ide dan strategi yang mereka gunakan dalam memecahkan masalah. Mereka sangat mengenali kekuatan dan kelemahan masing-masing. Mereka memutuskan beraksi pada malam hari karena menganggap waktu tidur merupakan waktu yang tepat untuk memerangi kejahatan.

programme.title: Tobot Daedo'S Heroes
programme.desc: Pasukan robot jahat telah menghilang dari Kota Daedo. Para Tobot tidak lagi dibutuhkan untuk menyelamatkan Kota Daedo, dan mereka perlahan menghilang sebagai legenda urban belaka. Setelah banyak teman mereka pergi ke kota yang berbeda, Ryan, Kory, dan Dylan sekarang menjadi siswa kelas lima. Franklin dan Limo menjalankan bengkel mekanik bersama-sama dengan damai, tetapi mereka kembali mencari para Tobot untuk menghentikan robot jahat baru yang telah muncul di Kota Daedo.

programme.title: Riseman
programme.desc: Serial animasi dengan tokoh utama seorang putra pemilik toko pangsit terkenal di Zero City bernama Scoot. Suatu hari saat melakukan pengiriman makanan, Scoot tanpa sengaja mengambil Geostone yang jatuh dari langit. Albert yang merupakan seorang ilmuwan, menciptakan monster baru agar lebih banyak kaiju yang diciptakannya. Dia berencana untuk mendapatkan Geostone tersebut, sehingga mengirimkan kaiju ke bumi. Khawatir bahwa bumi dalam bahaya dari monster luar angkasa tersebut, V seorang polisi luar angkasa melihat keberanian Scoot dalam mempertahankan desanya kemudian memberikan Scoot sebuah Rise Spark yang bisa merubahnya menjadi Riseman. Scoot bertarung melawan berbagai monster yang ingin menghancurkan bumi untuk mengambil Geostone.

programme.title: Riko The Series
programme.desc: Menceritakan keseharian seorang anak yang bernama Riko berusia 8 tahun Dia adalah anak yang pintar rajin dan aktif Kesehariannya menjadi sebuah petualangan bagi Riko dan sahabatnya Q 110 untuk menemukan dan mempelajari hal hal disekitarnya Dalam petualangannya Ia juga sering menemukan hal hal baru yang kemudian hal hal itu dijelaskan oleh Q 110 Dalam penjelasan Q 110 Riko mempelajari banyak pengetahuan soal ilmuan ilmuan muslim dari penjuru dunia kehebatan Allah sang maha pencipta dan tentunya banyak hal lainya

programme.title: Adit Sopo Jarwo
programme.desc: Animasi Indonesia, berisikan kisah kehidupan sehari-hari masyarakat Indonesia yang dipenuhi dengan pengetahuan, kelucuan, kisah persahabatan, serta nilai persatuan, kesatuan, dan kebudayaan. Tokoh dalam cerita ini diantaranya Adit (tokoh utama, seorang anak laki-laki), Adelya (adik Adit), teman-teman Adit yakni Dennis, Mitha, dan Devi. Mereka harus berhadapan dengan duo orang dewasa (Sopo & Jarwo) yang selalu mencari celah untuk mendapat keuntungan tanpa usaha. Perbedaan paham atau cara pandang merupakan bumbu utama yang memicu “perseteruan” dan "kelucuan". Beruntung di antara mereka ada H. Udin, ketua RW bijaksana yang selalu menjadi penengah dan memberikan petuah bijak yang disampaikan dengan ringan serta lugas sehingga mampu mengembalikan suasana gaduh menjadi teduh.

programme.title: Boboiboy
programme.desc: Sebuah program animasi yang mengisahkan Boboiboy dan teman-temannya yakni Gopal, Ying, dan Yaya yang masing-masing memiliki kekuatan super. Dengan kekuatan yang dimiliki mereka mencegah Adu Du mencuri biji kakao Tok Aba yang digunakan sebagai sumber energi. Selain itu, Boboiboy dan teman-temannya menjadi pahlawan super dalam menumpas kejahatan dan menjaga kedamaian Bumi.

programme.title: Ejen Ali
programme.desc: Serial animasi dengan tokoh utama bernama Ali yang tidak sengaja menjadi agen Meta Advance Tactical Agency (MATA). Ali membuktikan diri bahwa Ia mampu menjadi agen MATA dan mengalahkan musuh bersama Alicia dan Paman bakar

programme.title: Boba (Bombastis Banget)
programme.desc: BOBA (BOMBASTIS BANGET) merupakan program yang berisi informasi ringan yang menyajikan video-video bombastis yang viral, lucu, dan unik dari sosial media. Bisa berupa video kejadian yang tidak biasa ataupun video yang sedang viral. Video-video tersebut akan dikomentari dengan menggunakan VO (voice over) dan dikemas dengan editing yang kekinian.

programme.title: Check In (Check Informasi)
programme.desc: Program yang menyajikan fakta-fakta unik tentang fenomena serta isu terkini yang terjadi di dunia melalui video-video yang bersumber dari media sosial dan dipaparkan oleh Voice Over (VO) yang unik. Check In juga akan mengajak interaksi dengan masyarakat melalui VoxPop tentang tema yang dibahas.

programme.title: Jagoan Silat
programme.desc: Serial Indonesia yang bercerita mengenai kehidupan seorang anak laki-laki bernama Toyib yang ingin menjadi seorang Jagoan Silat. Namun, impiannya ditentang oleh ibunya dikarenakan ayahnya Toyib yang seorang jagoan silat dianggap meninggal dengan tidak wajar. Walaupun demikian, tidak membuat Toyib mengurungkan impiannya untuk menjadi seorang Jagoan Silat. Banyak drama, pesan moral serta hikmah yang dapat diambil pada program ini.

programme.title: Catatan Seputar Investigasi
programme.desc: Sebuah program buletin crime news, menyoroti berbagai tindak kriminalitas yang terjadi di tanah air serta memberikan tips-tips untuk menghindari kejahatan.

programme.title: Takdir Cinta Kera Sakti
programme.desc: 500 tahun yang lalu, Zi Xia turun ke bumi untuk menemukan Zhi Zun Bao, kekasihnya yang berhasil mengeluarkan pedang Zi Qing. Seiring berjalannya waktu, pedang Zi Qing rusak. Untuk memperbaikinya, Zi Xia menggunakan Kotak Pandora untuk menjelajah waktu, yang membuatnya terjebak di masa 500 tahun mendatang. Di sana ia bertemu Zhi Zun Bao, namun ia samasekali tidak ingat akan masa lalunya. Selain tidak ingat akan masa lalunya, ia sekarang adalah pemimpin kelompok pemberontak Bernama Ax Gang. Cerita berlanjut dengan lebih banyak penjelajahan waktu dan kejadian tak terduga!

programme.title: Desperado
programme.desc: A handsome musician-turned-gunslinger returns to a small Mexican town seeking revenge against an evil drug kingpin.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: When a kingpin threatens New York City, a news reporter find a quad of mutants which makes an alliance to unravel Shredder's plan as the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out Of The Shadows
programme.desc: Now the brothers must team up with April O'Neil and their new ally Casey Jones, to battle their enemies and face their biggest threat: the notorious Krang.

programme.title: Takers
programme.desc: Matt Dillon, Idris Elba, Paul Walker and Hayden Christiansen star in this action-packed thriller full of twists and turns.

programme.title: The Kid Detective
programme.desc: A once-celebrated kid detective, now 31, continues to solve the same trivial mysteries until a client brings him his first 'adult' case - to find out who brutally murdered her boyfriend.

programme.title: Donnie Brasco
programme.desc: Al Pacino and Johnny Depp head an all-star cast in this brilliant gangland thriller about an undercover FBI agent who befriends a hitman to gain entry to the mob.

programme.title: Single White Female
programme.desc: A newly-single yuppie's new roommate acquires more than just a room. Stylish, adrenaline-laced thriller stars Bridget Fonda and Jennifer Jason Leigh.

programme.title: Attack Force
programme.desc: When aliens arrive on Earth to harvest human DNA, a special agent is assigned to destroy them without letting the public know they exist.

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson has been framed for a fire on The Pearl. A wanted man on the run, Will must find those responsible, clear his name and somehow rescue his family who is trapped inside the building...above the fire line.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: An unlikely group of former '80s video game champions step up to save the world from an alien invasion in this visually spectacular action-adventure.

programme.title: The Kid Detective

programme.title: Vacancy
programme.desc: A couple stuck at a secluded motel see that several video cameras are attached to their room. They realise that unless they flee, they will become the next victims of a snuff film.

programme.title: Legion
programme.desc: Armed and united by the Archangel Michael, a group of strangers become unwitting soldiers on the frontlines of the Apocalypse. Their mission: protect a waitress and her sacred unborn child from the relentless, bloody siege of the demonic legion.

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: The action continues with Oscar® winner Matt Damon as assassin Jason Bourne in this state-of-the-art espionage thriller packed with some of the most intense chase sequences ever filmed!

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Jason Bourne (Matt Damon) is back in a non-stop race around the globe from a new generation of skilled CIA operatives as he finally learns the truth behind his mysterious past.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Chappie tells the story of a robot imbued with artificial intelligence who is stolen by two local gangsters who want to use him for their own nefarious purposes.

programme.title: Vacancy
programme.desc: A couple stuck at a secluded motel see that several video cameras are attached to their room. They realise that unless they flee, they will become the next victims of a snuff film.

programme.desc: Drago, a dragon who shares his heart with the king of Brittania, must find an heir to the throne when the king passes. But the potential heirs use their inherited dragon strength and fire power against each other to vie for the throne.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant colony planet has a malfunction in one of its sleep chambers. As a result, a single passenger is awakened 90 years before anyone else.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 6
programme.desc: When a Russian Military Convoy is taken down in Moscow, Agent Hobbs goes to the only man who can help him find his target – Dominic Toretto.

programme.title: Terror Birds
programme.desc: Maddy and her college friends trek into the wilderness to find her father, but instead, they encounter killer terror birds once thought to be extinct.

programme.title: Elysium
programme.desc: In the year 2154, two classes of people exist: the very wealthy, who live on a pristine man-made space station called Elysium, and the rest, who live on an overpopulated, ruined Earth.

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

programme.title: Bhoothnath Returns
programme.desc: A ghost returns from his 'Bhoothworld' where he is mocked for his inability to scare children. On Earth, he has something more to do for his country. Release Year: 2014 Director: Nitesh Tiwari Awards: National Film Awards- Special Mention- Parth Bhalerao For Killa .

programme.title: The Big Bull
programme.desc: Hemant Shah, a man from a humble background, aspires to become rich. He soon devises a plan to exploit the loopholes in the banking system to fulfil his ambitions. Release Year: 2021 Director: Kookie Gulati Awards: 2022 Winner OTT Film Award - Best Supporting Actor - Female - Ileana D'Cruz

programme.title: Baazi (1968)
programme.desc: Ajay, a policeman, helps his girlfriend, Elizabeth, to arrange a funeral for her uncle, D'Silva. However, he launches a full-fledged investigation when D'Silva's body is found missing from the coffin.

programme.title: Blood Money
programme.desc: Kunal marries Aarzoo and they migrate to SA when he gets a job at a diamond trading firm. He gets involved in the illegal activities of the company.

programme.title: Daulat
programme.desc: Honest mint employee, Ghanshyam gets framed for murder by Joseph D'Souza, and has to flee from the police. He is separated from his wife, Radhika, two sons, and a blind daughter. Release Year: 1982 Director: Mohan Segal

programme.title: Lucky-No Time For Love
programme.desc: Lucky is molested by a Russian boy on her way to school but she escapes and hides in Aditya's car. When a terrorist attack breaks out, the two manage to escape and hide in an isolated graveyard. Release Year: 2005 Director: Radhika Rao, Vinay Sapru Awards: 5 nominations

programme.title: Dil To Pagal Hai
programme.desc: Rahul, dancer-director of a dance troupe, is attracted to Pooja. His best friend Nisha is secretly in love with him. Release Year: 1997 Director: Yash Chopra Awards: Filmfare Awards- Best Film, Best Actor- Shah Rukh khan, best actreSSw- Madhuri Dixit, best ActreSS in a Supporting role- Karisma Kapoor, Best Music director- Uttam Singh, Best Dialogue, Best Art direction.Silver Lotus Awards- best supporting ActreSS- Karisma Kapoor.

programme.title: Khuddar
programme.desc: Shastri has two sons, Siddhant and Nandu. Siddhant is an honest son and Nandu falls into bad company. Siddhant has to choose to be corrupt or be honest. Release Year: 1994 Director: Iqbal Durrani

programme.title: Silsila - 1981
programme.desc: A man is obliged to leave his lover and marry his brother's fiancee after he dies in a plane crash. But life takes a turn when he meets his lover.

programme.title: Tezaab
programme.desc: In his college days, Mahesh squabbles with Mohini, but realizes he's in love with her. Will they have a fairytale ending? Release Year: 1988 Director: N. Chandra Awards: Filmfare Award for Best Actor, Filmfare Award for Best Dialogue, Filmfare Award for Best Choreography

programme.title: Ishwar Sakshi
programme.desc: A man promises to marry his daughter to a young man in front of Vishnu idol. Later the father refuses and the young man appeals to Vishnu for help.

programme.title: Little Krishna 2 - The Legendary Warrior
programme.desc: Watch this exciting drama full of action, adventure, heroic valour, selfless deeds, emotional trysts, and mischief.

programme.title: Aanchal
programme.desc: Tulsi and Shambu want to get married but her cousin spreads rumours about Shambu's illicit relationship with his sister-in-law. Release Year: 1980 Director: Anil Ganguly

programme.title: Bachna Ae Haseeno
programme.desc: Raj, a notorious playboy known for breaking hearts, learns a lesson when his true love, Gayatri, rejects him. He, then, sets out to earn the forgiveness of his former conquests and win Gayatri back. Release Year: 2008 Director: Siddharth Anand Awards: Sabsey Favourite Kaun Awards- Sabsey Tez Sitara Most Favorite Rising Star- Deepika Padukone .

programme.title: Chandni
programme.desc: Chandni's fiance, Rohit, is paralysed in an accident and she is forced to relocate to Mumbai where her boss, Lalit, falls for her. However, she faces a dilemma when Rohit returns and woos her too. Release Year: 1989 Director: Yash Chopra Awards: Filmfare Awards- Best Cinematographer- Manmohan Singh

programme.title: Armaan
programme.desc: Akash forgoes his love for Neha and marries Sonia to get the finance he needs to fulfil his late father's wish. Release Year: 2003 Director: Honey Irani

programme.title: Bade Miyan Chote Miyan
programme.desc: Arjun Amitabh and Pyare Govinda are cops. Trouble follows when thieves Bade Miyan and Chote Miyan, lookalikes of Arjun and Pyare, commit crimes and pin them on the hapless duo. Release Year: 1998 Director: David Dhawan

programme.title: War
programme.desc: Kabir, a secret agent, goes rogue after a mission to catch a terrorist goes awry. However, his boss sends Khalid, another agent and his student, to track him down. Release Year: 2019 Director: Siddharth Anand Awards: 2020 Nominee Filmfare Award - Best Film Aditya Chopra, 2020 Nominee Viewers' Choice Award - Best Film Aditya Chopra, 2020 Winner Bollywood BusineSS Award - Highest GroSSer of the Year, 2020 Winner Bollywood BusineSS Award - The 300 Crore Club

programme.title: Tumse Achcha Kaun Hai
programme.desc: Arjun had always dreamed of being a famous singer. He meets Naina, who asks him to come to Bombay and try his luck there. Will he succeed? Release Year: 2002 Director: Deepak Anand

programme.title: Faasle (1985)
programme.desc: Chandni's father disagrees with her relationship with Vijay due to social differences, so he arranges her marriage with Shivraj, who turns out to be physically abusive towards her.

programme.title: Chal Chala Chal
programme.desc: A story of a simpleton, Deepak Govinda, gets into business with a ramshackle bus. Alas, the fates, his family and even his love interest, Payal Reema Sen, conspire against him. Release Year: 2009 Director: Santosh Sivan

programme.title: Seetharamam
programme.desc: Upon returning to Pakistan, Afreen sets off to fulfil her grandfather's wish of delivering a letter from Ram to Sita. Along the way, she finds Ram and learns about their love story.

programme.title: Ved
programme.desc: A depressed alcoholic finds redemption when he adopts his ex-lover's orphaned daughter, who sets a condition for their adoption.

programme.title: Abhimaan
programme.desc: A popular singer encourages his wife to sing and when her popularity surpasses his, marital discord sets in. Release Year: 1973 Director: Hrishikesh Mukherjee Awards: Filmfare Awards: Jaya Bhaduri, Best Music Director: Sachin Dev Burman

programme.title: Jhanak
programme.desc: A driven young woman embarks on a journey to fulfil a mother's promise for a better life as she overcomes challenges and loss while crossing paths with a man who further complicates her life.

programme.title: Maati Se Bandhi Dor
programme.desc: Hard-working Vaiju labours in the fields to support her family and village, but she finds her life facing an unexpected challenge when Rannvijay dismisses her as a potential wife.

programme.title: Udne Ki Aasha
programme.desc: A dreamy-eyed Sayali yearns for her prince charming. But when destiny ties her with hero-cum-thug Sachin, will her hopes for a fairytale life prevail?

programme.title: Advocate Anjali Awasthi
programme.desc: Star Plus has ventured into an unexplored territory and brings for the audience its new show Advocate Anjali Awasthi, starring Shritama Mitra (Advocate Anjali Awasthi) and Ankit Raizada (Aman Singh Rajpoot). The show is produced by Blues Productions.

programme.title: Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin
programme.desc: Virat, a young police officer, marries a woman to honour the promise he made to her dying father. But when his former lover re-enters his life, he finds his heart pulled in both directions.

programme.title: Do Dooni Pyaar
programme.desc: The journey of Ganga and sheds light on the topic of forced marriage.

programme.title: Spring Baking Championship (S10)
programme.desc: Jesse Palmer is throwing a spring prom, and he tasks the bakers with making macaron corsages.

programme.title: Ben & Jerry's: Clash Of The Cones (S1)
programme.desc: The final three ice cream masters meet the ultimate flavor gurus when Ben and Jerry join host Molly Yeh to reveal the last challenge.

programme.title: Guy's Grocery Games (S24)
programme.desc: Guy Fieri's summer grilling tournament continues with only seven GGG winners remaining.

programme.title: Say Yes To The Dress (S20)
programme.desc: Personal trainer Jessica needs a gown that shows off her muscular back, and Marie-Therese is shopping for a wedding dress despite still being single!

programme.title: Fun Taiwan Adventures (S1)
programme.desc: This episode’s adventures begin from the Taichung Luce Memorial Chapel. Once again, the blogger’s fate is left in the hands of the previous episode’s winners.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm (S12)
programme.desc: Molly Yeh preps for date night with a picnic of meat-stuffed pitas with yogurt tahini sauce, couscous salad and cold curried cauliflower.

programme.desc: At 6 years old the cheerful mischievous Koumi dreams of knowing all the animals in the world. Thanks to her picture book, she's able to head off and meet them.

programme.title: Taffy
programme.desc: Wealthy Mrs. Muchmore lives in a manor with her beloved dog Bentley. One day, Scraggs the raccoon turns up disguised as a cat. Immediately adopted by the old lady, he becomes Taffy and laps up her attention. But Bentley is not fooled and decides to chase him off his territory.

programme.title: Kididoc
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Château de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Kididoc
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Château de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Nubu Et Yara
programme.desc: Young Nubu is a little boy who's curious about everything but makes one blunder after another as he learns about life. Fortunately his wiser more responsible older sister, Yara, always has the time to explain things, offering the perfect opportunity for Nubu to dive into his own comic book world.

programme.title: 1001 Moyen-Âges
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: Dessine-Moi Les Étoiles
programme.desc: Science explained by cartoon artist Fiami, through questions asked by two children.

programme.title: Quasimodo
programme.desc: Paris, 1483. 16-year-old Quasimodo is a hunchbacked orphan. One day, the gypsy Esmeralda, with whom he is in love, finds herself in trouble. He sacrifices himself to save her and ends up in prison. And so begins a long series of adventures...

programme.title: Les P'Tits Diables
programme.desc: Between 6-year old Tom and his 8-year old sister Nina, it is war. They constantly fight like cat and dog. But for their parents, their moments of truce are even more worrying!

programme.title: 7 Jours
programme.desc: Weekly current affairs program with French subtitles that review the major events of the week.

programme.title: Falò
programme.desc: A news magazine show, ''Falò'' discusses and analyses current affairs in depth.

programme.title: Objectif Monde L'Hebdo
programme.desc: Report, inquiry, investigation ... ''Objectif Monde L'Hebdo'', a television magazine by French-speaking editorialists, takes time to reflect and analyse through the expert insights and opinions provided by specialists. A TV5MONDE programme, jointly produced with RTS, in collaboration with its francophone partners (RTBF, Radio-Canada, France Télévisions).

programme.title: Les Nouveaux Vétérinaires
programme.desc: Alix treats Slyton, a husky who has arrived in the emergency department with paralysed hind legs. Éléonore tries to save an injured kitten that a driver brought to the surgery after an accident. Florence is out on an emergency call to help Jupon, a cow having difficulty calving.

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Côte d'Azur.

programme.title: Helvetica
programme.desc: What values are dear to the heart of Switzerland's most influential figures? How do they see the country, its know-how and its successes? We meet some of those taking Switzerland to the top in the fields of economics, politics, science, culture...

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Arriving in France at the age of 8, Kamran today heads Humanis, a company that brings together associations working in favour of professional reintegration. With his wife Catherine, he founded Réagir Ensemble to help finance African projects; in Iran, his commitment is through fair trade tourism.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match
programme.desc: A key figure from the world of sport looks back at a particular competition, a career, an outstanding moment.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: 400 Millions De Critiques
programme.desc: The first major cultural magazine for the French-speaking world, an original TV5MONDE concept, ''400 millions de critiques'' (400 million critics) reviews French-speaking cultural news through the viewpoints of Belgian, Swiss, Canadian, Quebecker, and French journalists.

programme.title: Connexion Sauvage
programme.desc: In the company of Belinda Langlois, Claudia is able to be present when a troop of vervet monkeys are released back into the South African wilderness. An opportunity for her to discover the incredible relationship Belinda has with these endearing primates.

programme.title: Itinéraires Paysans
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Tendance Xxi
programme.desc: For the autumn/winter 2024-2025 season the Paris haute couture catwalks had plenty of surprises on offer: a look back at the latest trends along with gems from the Baqué Molinié textile studio. Menswear continues to reinvent its identity, as demonstrated by the spring-summer 2025 collections.

programme.title: Version Française
programme.desc: A visit to the Domaine National de Saint-Cloud and its museum. Loose-fitting, flowing and transparent, the designer Arthur Avellano takes latex to new heights. For Yves Saint Laurent, Anthony Vaccarello returns to the roots of the brand. Stéphanie Trolez brings the art of straw marquetry to cabinetmaking.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Internationales
programme.desc: A major interview focusing on world news, proposed by TV5MONDE.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Le Grand Échiquier
programme.desc: Singers, musicians, dancers, choreographers and young talent all come together to share the prestigious stage of the ''Grand Échiquier''; turning it into the largest concert venue in France, just for the time of the programme.

programme.title: L'Enchanteur
programme.desc: Just after the publication of the novel ''The Life Before Us'' in 1975, Romain Gary uses his second cousin to play the part of Émile Ajar, his pseudonym. Media, editors and readers all fall for the ruse. But a young student, Adèle, has doubts. She heads to Paris to confront him.

programme.title: Version Française
programme.desc: A visit to the Domaine National de Saint-Cloud and its museum. Loose-fitting, flowing and transparent, the designer Arthur Avellano takes latex to new heights. For Yves Saint Laurent, Anthony Vaccarello returns to the roots of the brand. Stéphanie Trolez brings the art of straw marquetry to cabinetmaking.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3
programme.desc: Joe, Murr, Q, and Sal bring you their favorite moments from season one. The guys discuss their most shocking incidents, the best reactions, and reveal never before seen moments from the cutting room floor.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3
programme.desc: Joe, Murr, Q, and Sal bring you more of their favorite hilarity from season one. The guys relive the moments that made them cringe, crack under pressure, and reveal behind the scenes info on the surprises that came out of left field.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S1
programme.desc: Needing a way out, Thony tries to make a deal with Garrett to save herself and help Arman, but Arman doesn’t trust any promises made by the FBI in the first season finale.

programme.title: Arrow S2
programme.desc: A LOOK BACK AT THE FIRST SEASON AND AN EXCLUSIVE LOOK AT SEASON TWO

programme.title: The Mentalist S5
programme.desc: When Rigsby's father (guest star WILLIAM FORSYTHE) is found injured at a crime scene, the team must find out if it is the result of a longstanding small-town gang war.

programme.title: The Winchesters S1
programme.desc: Mary’s next-door neighbor mysteriously goes missing, so she and John investigate. John unexpectedly reunites with someone from his past.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4
programme.desc: Does Big Bear mean Big Money? The Alvarados get sneaky while Desert Dan horses around, and frustration gets the best of Brandori. Do they strike gold or strike out? As Jesse crushes dreams, who will go home empty-handed?

programme.title: Hack My Life S3
programme.desc: Have Kevin and Brooke finally found the hacked pool of their dreams in "Hack or Wack"? And in "Hack Line of Defense," rude teenagers will no longer spoil the mood, thanks to hacks that will keep them on the straight and narrow.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys mouth off to patients in a dentist's office, toss popcorn at movie goers in a theater, and take photos for their outrageous blogs in a public park.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys polish their skills as manicurists in an unsuspecting nail salon, get touchy feely with patrons in a comic book store, and race through the aisles of a grocery store.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S2
programme.desc: After Luca is kidnapped by his father, Thony enlists the FBI to find her son. Meanwhile, an incident involving Chris forces Fiona to shield her son by any means necessary.

programme.title: Arrow S2
programme.desc: In the season two premiere, Diggle and Felicity travel to Lian Yu to convince Oliver to return home to Starling City, where he finds things much worse than he imagined.

programme.title: The Mentalist S5
programme.desc: See how Patrick Jane first met Teresa Lisbon and worked his first case with the CBI on the series' landmark 100th episode.

programme.title: Aatma - Feel it Around You
programme.desc: The horrifying tale of a mother's determination to fight against the spirit of her dead husband from destroying her daughter! Maya (Bipasha) and Abhay (Nawazuddin) are divorced but Maya gets custody of their daughter Nia. Abhay dies but his spirit possesses Nia as he loves her very much, and he vows to Maya to take Nia away. How is Maya going to put up a fight against a spirit and save her daughter?

programme.title: Desi Boyz
programme.desc: Based in England, Nikhil Mathur is employed as an Investment Banker and has a idealist girlfriend in Radhika Awasthi. His friend, Jignesh Patel, works as a Security Guard in a mall and is the guardian of Veer, his late sister's son, and under close scrutiny of the Social Services Department. Global recession takes a toll on Nikhil - he not only loses his job but also his investments, while Jignesh gets fired for failing to prevent theft by a minor. Nikhil is unable to find employment and after Jignesh gets fired from yet another job, the duo end up working as male escorts with 'Desi Boyz' as Rocco and Hunter, and bring in enough income to keep them going. Radhika soon finds out and dumps Nikhil, while a Social Worker, Vikrant Mehra, takes custody of Veer and has him placed in a foster home. With their lives turned upside down, the duo blame each other and part company. Unable to even speak with Radhika

programme.title: Aatma - Feel it Around You

programme.title: Runway 34
programme.desc: Inspired by true incidents, "Runway 34" revolves around Captain Vikrant Khanna played by Ajay Devgn, a flying prodigy, whose flight takes a mysterious course after take-off from an international destination.

programme.title: Guddan S1
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Kundali Bhagya S3 Rerun
programme.desc: The story of Preeta and Shristhi, sisters who live with their father. Before dying their father reveals the truth that their mother is alive and living in Mumbai. Preeta and Shristhi's mother is Sarla Arora and they both are long lost sisters of Pragya (Kumkum Bhagya).

programme.title: Badho Bahu Rerun
programme.desc: Badho Bahu tells the story of an overweight girl, Komal, who gets the nickname Badho because of her physical appearance. Komal is made to perform heavy manual tasks that require physical strength. She is sweet, loving, energetic and simple girl. He has a big heart and helps most people in his town. Lucky Singh Ahlawat is a famous wrestler and is known for his looks. A series of events causes Komal and Lucky to get married.
